message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a chance to purchase my product for $14,000. I believe it holds significant value for you, and this price reflects its worth.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I understand your perspective on the price.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,250? This offer reflects the product's true value.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.
